narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Wv Birth to Three is a Early Intervention Provider Agency provider based in Charleston, WV. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $60.0M in Medicaid payments across 482K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $60.0M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
